ygData.messageBody:
I have one and you better be good with 1hand blunt! othwerwise its a useless
decoration..the Spell it casts does 5 damage direct(my 1HB skill is feeble)
I'd pay maybe 100 plat for it...

Or you can get your own in Lake rathe!

~ Auraelle Dracul ~
~Priestess of Veeshan~
~ Follower of Tunare ~
~ Lords of Light ~

From: <SPRUSBRUCE@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, July 18, 1999 11:05 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Water Crystal Staff


> From: SPRUSBRUCE@...
